item.title: English 07/10/2020
item.description: Question of the day. Adjective to Adverb Please convert following adjective to adverb. beautiful wonderful pretty busy comfortable reputable enthusiastic ecstatic friendly daily

item.title: English 06/10/2020
item.description: Question of the day. Negative and Positive structure Change these negative structure sentences to positive structure sentences. e.g. He was not happy(negative structure) - He was unhappy(positive structure). Eating meat would be completely not typical for a vegetarian. Because he was not social, he was looking for a career where he didnâ€™t have to work with the general public. By the time you actually feel thirsty, your body is already slightly not hydrated.

item.description: Question of the day. Commonly misspelt words Correct the following misspelt words. goverment unfortunatly dissapoint grammer commitee embarass basicly accomodation definately interupt neccessary truely existance cemetary calender

item.title: English 30/09/2020
item.description: Question of the day. Put apostrophes where needed in the following passsage. Mashas little sister and parents were going on a week holidays. While they are not at home, she would stay with her grandparents at their house. She hoped theyd take her to the Childrens water adventure play park. She would go to lots of water activities there. She loves doing swimming and go on to the water slides.
